name: Focus (Whoatsnew)
description:
Can you keep you focus for 60 seconds? 

Challenge yourself in this casual puzzle game in which you need to answer the question by selecting only two options, "true" or "false".

For more details check "help" section in game.

This game can be played with mouse or following keyboard keys(not for help section) - 

press A key for "True"

press D key for "False"

If you are idle for 5 seconds game will pause. press resume to continue the game.

Please note that this game is still under development. Only core mechanics has been added along with decent level graphics. Feedback will be really helpful. Thanks for playing this game :)
